title: AP Varus
body:
He got a **massive** buff in season 6.

Ok, so a full AP Varus will have 700 AP at full build.

With 700 AP, popping 3 stacks of blight will deal 57% the targets maximum health
(6x7)+15=57

With the S6 changes to Varus, he applies 3 stacks of blight to everyone who gets snared by his ultimate.

{{champion:110}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3135}} 


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: I like the fact that in s6 you can build whatever you want on whoever you want and play them wherever you want and if you are smart it will work :) rito done good!
Except he lacks any reliable AoE needed to kill any other champions affected by blight.

His Q can easily hit multiple targets, and his E can hit two people pretty easily in a tight space, not to mention that when the champions in question are locked down by Varus ult, landing skillshots is a piece of cake.

With 40% cdr, you will be throwing out a Q every 4.8 seconds, and an E every 6 seconds.
AP Varus is incredibly fun. The loss of 5% per AA will be missed though.
